1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Rafi' that:The Prophet went around to all of his wives in one night, and he had a bath after each one of them. It was said to him: "O Messenger of Allah, why not make it one bath?" He said: "This is purer, better and cleaner

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ يَغْتَسِلُ عِنْدَ كُلِّ وَاحِدَةٍ غُسْلاً
chapter.eng-name: Concerning one who has a bath after intimacy with each (of his wives)
